column5: hey guys how's it going!!!!  jus got back from Lake Nipissing  with Rob Hyatts Ice Bungalows!!!  His service was great and had no complaints what so ever through our stay!!  i'm pretty exhausted and jus wanted to start the thread so i can show off the beauty pike i tagged   here are a few of the pics!!
Nice pike... Sledgehammer handle!..How was the walleye fishing?

awesome report!  I hear Rob Hyatt is oneof the best for getting people into fish up there.  i was up in north bay for the weekend but unfortunatly i was not fishing.  i am hopeing to go back next weekend but think a bunch of us may hit a smaller lake in the area then nipissing.  Thanks for the report!  Nice pike!  CHeers!
RIGHT..ON..MAN     that is a nice pike,and a few great pics...looks like you guys had a blast up there,abd did real well catching some walleyes as well...congrats
yea it was a great trip... and the pike was released!!!!!
Beauty Pike, and a nice little pickerel there too.  Joey
Chunky pike ,I noticed the tale on the walleye looked like it was shortened by a predator.Thanks for the great report.
hey sweet report man and awesome pike. i'm heading up to robs next weekend, mind if i ask where you picked up your bait/price? what'd you get the gator on???
Nice report man, and that must have benn fun pulling that pike through the ice... WTG!!!
well done!  I think thats the same bungalow we were in last year  (ours also had canned Keiths under the bed!)
Great report and pics.  That pike must've put up quite the tussle!
Great report, nice pictures, can't wait til next year.
very nice pike through the ice.  All that pressure and serious fish just keep showing up
wow the fin/tail paterns on that pike are just awesone!  Cheers, UF
yea it was an awsome battle..... it was a little scary due to the fact that the line i was using was only 6lb and it was rubbin against his teeth the whole time!!!!
